ing: 1 pound cooked lobster meat, cut into bite-sized pieces
des: "A delicious treat anytime! A simple lobster salad with butter and just a hint of mayonnaise so that you can still taste the sweet lobster meat. Serve on toasted rolls or croissants. You won't be disappointed!"
ins: Place the lobster chunks into a medium bowl, and pour the melted butter over. Toss to coat, then stir in mayonnaise and season with black pepper. Cover and chill for 20 minutes before serving.
